items.title: Oktoberfest opening delayed in Munich after fatal fire and bomb threat
items.description: Mayor Dieter Reiter said the Oktoberfest would remain closed until early evening because of a bomb threat.

items.title: South African firebrand MP Malema convicted of firing a gun in public
items.description: Julius Malema, known for his incendiary rhetoric, was recently convicted of hate speech.

items.title: Man suspected of ordering murder of three Argentine women arrested
items.description: The brutal torture and killing of the three women in Argentina sent shockwaves through the region.

items.title: Activists say Gaza flotilla circled by Israeli warship
items.description: The Global Sumud Flotilla accused an Israeli vessel of steering "dangerously close" to one of its boats.

items.title: Moments as 6.9 magnitude earthquake hit Philippines
items.description: Moments as 6.9 magnitude earthquake hit Philippines
